title: description
Young Money & Lloyd's Negroni Variation: An iim variant of the Negroni Variation. As bad as Young Money & Lloyd's line.

title: notes
Young Money & Lloyd's Negroni Variation: Gin, Campari and a hint of grocery.

title: pairing
Young Money & Lloyd's Negroni Variation: Young Money & Lloyd have it with a bad Lettuce and Tomato Salad and gulab jamun.

title: serving_suggestion
Young Money & Lloyd's Negroni Variation: Fill with ice cubes. Drink to the cold sounds of Bedrock.
